name: Deep Diver 2020
description:
DEEP DIVER 2020!

Chilligames ~ 2020 production.

We are happy to bring to you our new game Deep Diver! Enjoy the deep sea with our funny octopus Octy.

ONLINE-WORLDWIDE- LEADERBOARD: In the download version you can take part of this challenge and make your name appear on the top-ten highscore-board. There are more than a hundred food to collect! Eat them all! 

The game is in early access but compared to Keep the Change(our other game) this one is almost finished. We had a hard time trying to complete KTC this year, so we decided to work on something easier and get the ropes to be able to finish KTC on 2021.

We hope you like this game as much as we do.

Feel free to donate no matter the ammount, we will love you for that

Download the game using the Download button, then unzip it and play No installation needed.

Name your price: You can select $0.0 if you prefer to play it free. 
Remember you willl be a huge help if you decide to donate and there is no minimum ammount.
Web version cant see or upload Highscores.
We highly reccomend you to play the downloaded version!

Thanks and Game On!
